tool_description: Monitors and analyzes the performance of cart recovery campaigns, tracking conversion rates, ROI, and campaign effectiveness across segments.

campaign_ids.description: List of campaign IDs to monitor

error_messages: Invalid campaign_ids: Must contain valid campaign identifiers
Invalid monitoring period: End date must be after start date
Campaign not found: One or more campaign IDs do not exist
Insufficient data: Monitoring period contains insufficient campaign data
usage: Track recovery campaign performance by providing campaign_ids and monitoring period. Enable breakdowns for detailed analysis by segment and channel.

overall_recovery_rate.description: Overall campaign recovery rate as percentage
